# Lunyco - Alejandro Cortes Portfolio

## Overview
Personal portfolio website showcasing full-stack development projects, AI engineering work, and technical blog posts.

## Author
- Name: Alejandro Cortes
- Role: Full-Stack Engineer & AI Enthusiast
- Email: ale@lunyco.com
- Website: https://lunyco.com

## Tech Stack
- Frontend: Next.js 16, React 19, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS 4
- Backend Experience: Django, Django REST Framework, Node.js
- Databases: PostgreSQL
- Cloud: AWS (Amplify, RDS, AppRunner, Secrets Manager)
- Testing: Cypress, Playwright, Jest
- AI/ML: RAG, Embeddings, LangChain (in progress)

## Work Experience
- The SilverLogic - Full-Stack & Automation Engineer (2024-Present)
- Freelance - Full-Stack Engineer (2023-Present)
- Xoom/PayPal - Senior QA Automation (2020-2024)
- Zuntex - Lead Software Engineer (2019-2020)

## Skills
TypeScript, Next.js, React, Django, DRF, Node.js, PostgreSQL, AWS, CI/CD, Cypress, Playwright, Jest, Tailwind CSS, RAG/Embeddings

## Projects
### Baxzar Platform
Full-stack e-commerce solution featuring user authentication, product management, shopping cart, and Stripe payment integration. Built with Next.js frontend and Django REST API backend.
- Tech: Next.js 15, TypeScript, Django, DRF, PostgreSQL, Stripe, Tailwind CSS, AWS
- URL: https://www.baxzar.com
